requests.title: E-commerce Brand Identity Package
requests.description: Looking for a complete brand identity package for our new e-commerce fashion store. Need logo design, color palette, typography, social media templates, and packaging design. We want a modern, minimalist aesthetic that appeals to young professionals.

requests.title: Tech Startup Marketing Campaign
requests.description: Seeking comprehensive marketing campaign for our SaaS startup launch. Need social media strategy, content creation, and paid advertising management. Target audience is small business owners and entrepreneurs.

requests.title: Restaurant Website Redesign
requests.description: Need a modern website redesign for our family restaurant. Should include online ordering system, menu management, and reservation feature. Mobile-first design is crucial as 70% of our customers use phones.

requests.title: Product Launch Video Campaign
requests.description: Looking for a video marketing campaign for our new fitness product launch. Need 1 main promotional video (2-3 minutes) and 5 short social media cuts. Style should be energetic and motivational.

requests.title: Business Consultant Portfolio
requests.description: Need a professional portfolio website that showcases my consulting services, client testimonials, and case studies. Looking for a clean, corporate design that instills trust and professionalism.

requests.title: Instagram Content Creation
requests.description: Seeking a content creator for our wellness brand's Instagram. Need 30 posts per month including photos, carousels, and Reels. Content should focus on healthy lifestyle tips, product showcases, and user testimonials.
